entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
